price.description: Sale price of the house in dollars

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the house

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the house

sqft_living.description: Living room area in square feet

floors.description: Number of floors in the house

waterfront.description: Whether the house has a view to a waterfront

value_dict.0: The house does not have a view to a waterfront
value_dict.1: The house has a view to a waterfront
The house is in poor condition
value_dict.2: The house is in fair condition
value_dict.3: The house is in average condition
value_dict.4: The house is in good condition
value_dict.5: The house is in excellent condition

grade.description: Grade given to the housing unit, based on King County grading system

sqft_above.description: Area of house excluding basement in square feet

sqft_basement.description: Area of the basement in square feet

yr_built.description: Year the house was initially built

yr_renovated.description: Year the house was last renovated

zipcode.description: Zip code area where the house is located

sqft_living15.description: The square footage of interior housing living space for the nearest 15 neighbors

sqft_lot15.description: The square footage of the land lots of the nearest 15 neighbors
